item.title: PostgreSQL 10 Full Text Search Support for JSON and JSONB
item.description: 这是对 JSON 数据的又一个很酷的补充. 现在我们可以轻松地添加 json 值的全文搜索.

item.title: PostgreSQL Aggregate Functions
item.description: Sometimes, when we use SQL aggregate functions, we hope to collect all primary keys in each column group.
